name: LocationFeatureSpecification
description: Specifies a location feature by providing a structured value representing a feature of an accommodation as a property-value pair of varying degrees of formality.
title: LocationFeatureSpecification

fields.name: hoursAvailable
fields.title: hoursAvailable
fields.description: The hours during which this service or contact is available.

fields.name: validFrom
fields.title: validFrom
fields.description: The date when the item becomes valid.

fields.name: validThrough
fields.title: validThrough
fields.description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.
